# Contributing to nestjs-config

## How can I contribute? 

### Reporting bugs

Please [raise an issue](https://github.com/nestjs-community/nestjs-config/issues/new) if you find a bug within the package. However if you find a bug in application please raise an issue on [stackoverflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/nestjs).

### Suggesting features

Please [create an issue](https://github.com/nestjs-community/nestjs-config/issues/new) if you wish to suggest a new feature.

### pull requests

Pull requests are welcome! If you're submitting large feature changes please consider raising an issue and consulting the community first before doing so :happy:.

### Questions

Feel free to ask your question as an issue. Please specify that it is a question. However for code questions on "how can I implement blah" or "I have an issue with this error" for example, please consider asking your question on [stackoverflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/nestjs) if it seems more relevant to do so.
